md:
giải nghĩa từ "email" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Email** (noun)

* Meaning: thư điện tử (a message sent electronically through the internet)
* Example sentence: "I'll send you an email with the details of the meeting."
* Related words: inbox, spam, attachment, forward, reply.

**Email** (verb)

* Meaning: gửi thư điện tử (to send a message electronically through the internet)
* Example sentence: "I'll email you the document as soon as I finish it."
* Related words: send, receive, compose, delete, archive.

Note: In Vietnamese, "email" is often translated as "thư điện tử" or simply "email" (borrowed from English).
html:
giải nghĩa từ "email" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Email (noun)

  • Meaning: thư điện tử (a message sent electronically through the internet)
  • Example sentence: "I'll send you an email with the details of the meeting."
  • Related words: inbox, spam, attachment, forward, reply.

Email (verb)

  • Meaning: gửi thư điện tử (to send a message electronically through the internet)
  • Example sentence: "I'll email you the document as soon as I finish it."
  • Related words: send, receive, compose, delete, archive.

Note: In Vietnamese, "email" is often translated as "thư điện tử" or simply "email" (borrowed from English).
